explanation: The clause only states that the Disclosing Party has no obligation to provide or update Confidential Information; it does not expressly state that neither party is obligated to enter into any further agreement or transaction. Therefore, the contract lacks the clarification required by the rule.
rule: Clarify that the NDA does not obligate either party to enter into any further agreement or transaction.
exampleLanguage: This Agreement does not obligate either party to enter into any further agreement or transaction.
